title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1209/93 of 17 May 1993 fixing the agricultural conversion rates and other consequences of the monetary realignment of 13 May 1993
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1209/93 of 17 May 1993 fixing the agricultural conversion rates and other consequences of the monetary realignment of 13 May 1993
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The correcting factor as referred to in Article 1 (c) of Regulation (EEC) No 3813/92 is hereby fixed at 1 207 509.
The agricultural conversion rates are fixed in Annex I.

In the case referred to in Article 15 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 1068/93, the agricultural conversion rate fixed in advance shall be replaced by the ecu rate for the currency concerned, as listed in Annex II:
- Table A, where the latter rate is higher than the rate fixed in advance, or
- Table B, where the latter rate is lower than the rate fixed in advance.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 18 May 1993. However, Article 1 shall apply from 14 May 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
